content: 13 chain 1 and treble_crochet in last sktch row 2 1 chain 10 and turn 2 single_crochet into chain 5 space 3 chain 7 4 cluster into centre of flower 5 chain 3 and cluster into centre of flower 6 chain 7 7 single_crochet into chain 5 space 8 repeat 3 8 unkl the last chain 5 space 9 chain 5 and treble_crochet into the open chain 6 space to finish off the row row 3 1 chain 10 and turn your work 2 2 trwc into the back bar of the 5th chain leaving 3 loops on the hook 3 3 trwc into chain 5 space leaving 6 loops on hook 4 3 trwc into the chain 7 space and pull through the 9 loops on hook 5 chain 5 2 trwc into centre leaving 3 loops on hook 6 trwc into chain 3 space between the 2 petals and pull through the 4 loops on hook 7 chain 5 and treble_crochet into the same chain 3 space 8 chain 5 2 trwc into triple crochet leaving 3 loops on hook 9 3 trwc into chain 7 space leaving 6 loops on hook 10 in the next chain 7 space 3 trwc leaving 9 loops on hook 11 pull through 9 loops on hook 12 chain 5 and 2 trwc into centre leaving 3 loops 13 trwc into chain 3 space pull through all 4 loops on hook 14 chain 5 and treble_crochet into same chain 3 space 15 repeat 8 14 unkl the last chain 7 single_crochet chain 5 space 16 chain 5 2 trwc into the last triple crochet made 3 trwc into chain 7 space 3 trwc into chain 10 space at end of row pull through all 9 loops on hook 17 chain 5 2 trwc into centre trwc into chain 10 space pull through 4 loops on hook row 4 1 chain 6 and turn your work 2 cluster into centre 3 chain 3 cluster into centre 4 chain 7 single_crochet into chain 5 space 5 chain 7 6 repeat 2 5 unkl last flower 7 cluster chain 3 cluster into centre of flower 8 chain 1 treble_crochet into the top chain from the last petal at the end of row row 5 the same as row 1 but crochebng into chain 3 and chain 7 spaces instead of single crochets 1 chain 6 and turn 2 treble_crochet into chain 3 space chain 5 treble_crochet again into chain 3 space 3 repeat 8 14 from row 3 unkl end of row last chain 5 space 4 chain 1 treble_crochet into chain 6 space repeat row 2 4 for a total of four flowers in length and fasten_off keep repea-ng the pa5ern if you want to make the flower mesh longer straps 1 a=ach the yarn 6 5 inches from one end of the panel and chain 200 and fasten_off 2 thread the chain through the opposite top corner of the end of the panel
